parameters.query:
SELECT *
FROM FRESHA_DATA_CONNECTOR.FRESHA_DATA_263.CLIENTS
WHERE
  SIGNUP_DATE >= DATEADD(day, -7, CURRENT_DATE())
  OR LAST_APPOINTMENT_DATE >= DATEADD(day, -7, CURRENT_DATE());

parameters.sqlQuery:
MERGE `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.clients` T
USING `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.clients_stage` S
ON T.CLIENT_ID = S.CLIENT_ID

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    SIGNUP_DATE = S.SIGNUP_DATE,
    FIRST_APPOINTMENT_DATE = S.FIRST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_DATE = S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    CLIENT = S.CLIENT,
    GENDER = S.GENDER,
    AGE = S.AGE,
    MOBILE_NUMBER = S.MOBILE_NUMBER,
    EMAIL = S.EMAIL,
    IS_REBOOKED = S.IS_REBOOKED,
    REFERRAL_SOURCE = S.REFERRAL_SOURCE,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_LOCATION = S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_LOCATION,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_WITH = S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_WITH,
    SMS_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED = S.SMS_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    WHATSAPP_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED = S.WHATSAPP_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED = S.EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    ACCEPTS_SMS_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS = S.ACCEPTS_SMS_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    ACCEPTS_WHATSAPP_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS = S.ACCEPTS_WHATSAPP_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    ACCEPTS_EMAIL_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS = S.ACCEPTS_EMAIL_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    TOTAL_APPOINTMENTS = S.TOTAL_APPOINTMENTS,
    TOTAL_APPOINTMENT_VALUE = S.TOTAL_APPOINTMENT_VALUE,
    REVIEWS = S.REVIEWS,
    _loaded_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    CLIENT_ID,
    SIGNUP_DATE,
    FIRST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    CLIENT,
    GENDER,
    AGE,
    MOBILE_NUMBER,
    EMAIL,
    IS_REBOOKED,
    REFERRAL_SOURCE,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_LOCATION,
    LAST_APPOINTMENT_WITH,
    SMS_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    WHATSAPP_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    ACCEPTS_SMS_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    ACCEPTS_WHATSAPP_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    ACCEPTS_EMAIL_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    TOTAL_APPOINTMENTS,
    TOTAL_APPOINTMENT_VALUE,
    REVIEWS,
    _loaded_at
  )
  VALUES (
    S.CLIENT_ID,
    S.SIGNUP_DATE,
    S.FIRST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_DATE,
    S.CLIENT,
    S.GENDER,
    S.AGE,
    S.MOBILE_NUMBER,
    S.EMAIL,
    S.IS_REBOOKED,
    S.REFERRAL_SOURCE,
    S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_LOCATION,
    S.LAST_APPOINTMENT_WITH,
    S.SMS_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    S.WHATSAPP_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    S.EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED,
    S.ACCEPTS_SMS_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    S.ACCEPTS_WHATSAPP_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    S.ACCEPTS_EMAIL_MARKETING_NOTIFICATIONS,
    S.TOTAL_APPOINTMENTS,
    S.TOTAL_APPOINTMENT_VALUE,
    S.REVIEWS,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
  );
